howItWork.title: How start using Mecht.Ai service
howItWork.description: Remote expert is a software solution based on smart glasses, smartphones, tablets and PCs to share information between on-site operators and support departments. It effectively assists users executing difficult tasks and operation maintenance, having real-time data at hand, while keeping a close look at the remote situation.

howItWork.step2Description: Module for remote control can be installed on old analogue controlled or new digital devices

description.title: Platform scheme
description.description: Our real-time FPV platform helps to send the managing commands and receive video from remote device with no delays (<200 ms)
description.benefit1: Web platform for remote (long distance) control of robots from home, office or other places with the Internet
description.benefit2: Control is carried out using a conventional Sony Playstation joystick (or equivalent) and a PC (or tablet)
description.benefit3: The control is performed from the first person (FPV) using a camera mounted on the robot
description.benefit4: The operator can control the movement of the robot and perform other available actions using the function keys on the joystick
description.benefit5: The operator can connect to various robots (P2P) and perform tasks specified in the system

benefits.title: Platform benefits
benefits.description: Mecht.ai help you to increase efficiency of your company services and reduce costs and risks
benefits.benefit1: An hour of work of a remotely controlled robot costs 1.7 times cheaper than performing similar functions by a person
benefits.benefit2: In a unit of time, the operator of a remote robot can perform 1.2 more tasks than when performing them physically.
benefits.benefit3: The “endless order” technology, similar to that in taxi services, reduces downtime
benefits.benefit4: Process transparency enables continuous process improvement and risk reduction
